articles.author: News18
articles.title: 'Sound of Hell': NASA's Video of Screaming Eye of Helix Nebula Will Give You the Chills - News18
articles.description: In its caption, the NASA explained saying that the Helix Nebula is 655 light-years away from the earth, and three light-years across. The eerie sound that is heard in the post comes from the dying sun-like star’s life.
articles.content: The ever-mysterious and fascinating space never fails to surprise us mere humans and a recent post by American space agency National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) has done it yet again.… [+1638 chars]
